title: Jimbot Profile Commands
description:
(replace ? with your servers prefix)
Quotations are required around parameters
​

fields.name: Register With Jimbot
fields.value:
- **?register** *[friend_code | optional]*
Register as a user to Jimbot. Accepts an optional friend code when registering. This can be changed later.
​

fields.name: Set Friend Code
fields.value:
- **?friendcode** *[friend_code]*
Add your friend code to your profile. Friend code must be the 9 digit friend code and nothing more.
​

fields.name: Add Build
fields.value:
- **?addbuild** *[build_name | parameter] [build_url | parameter]*
Add a build to your profile. Build name and Build URL must be passed as parameters respectively.
- example: **?addbuild "turtle" "https://ffbeequip.com/builder.html?server=gl#bb0bcea0-e60c-11e9-b677-3b8586bd2e6d"**
​

fields.name: Remove Build
fields.value:
- **?removebuild** *[build_name]*
Remove a build from your profile.
- example: **?removebuild turtle**
​

fields.name: Enable Auto Builds
fields.value:
- **?enableautobuild**
Activating this option will make Jimbot create a build image whenever you post an FFBEEquip build URL.
​

fields.name: Disable Auto Builds
fields.value:
- **?disableautobuild**
Disabling this option will prevent Jimbot from automatically building an image with your URL.
​

fields.name: View User Profile
fields.value:
- **?profile** *[user_id | optional]*
View the profile of yourself, or of another user when using a mention.
- example: **?profile @Jimoori#2006**
​

fields.name: View User Friend Code
fields.value:
- **?friend** *[user_id | optional]*
View the friend code of yourself, or of another user when using a mention.
- example: **?friend @Jimoori#2006**
​

fields.name: View User Build
fields.value:
- **?userbuild** *[user_id | optional]* "*[build_name | parameter]*"
View the builds of yourself, or of another user when using a mention. The name of the build must be passed as a parameter.
- example: **?userbuild @Jimoori#2006 "turtle"**
​

fields.name: View Personal Build
fields.value:
- **?mybuild** *[build_name]*
View a build registered to yourself.
- example: **?userbuild turtle**
